Descriptions.ShortDescription: Multi-provider AI assistant with MCP equipment control for NINA
Descriptions.LongDescription: AI Assistant plugin for NINA supporting 6 AI providers: GitHub Models (free), OpenAI, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, Ollama (local), and OpenRouter. Features direct equipment control via Anthropic Claude's tool-use API connected to NINA Advanced API (MCP). Control cameras, mounts, focusers, filter wheels, guiders, and more through natural language.
